sentences.en: A psychologist who subscribes to behaviorism .
sentences.cn: 赞成行为主义的心理学者。

sentences.en: Begin with different theories, Behaviorism and Humanism explicate the origin of abnormal psychology and the remedies.
sentences.cn: 行为主义和人本主义从不同的理论出发, 阐述了异常心理产生的原因和治疗方法.

sentences.en: For demonstrating the principles of reinforcement theories and their application in industry show the movie: business behaviorism and the bottom line.
sentences.cn: 为在工业示范增强理论及的原则他们的申请，表示电影：生意，行为主义和损益。

sentences.en: From the legislative mode, U. S. A. is transformed to behaviorism from structuralism, while Germany and EC pursue behaviorism.
sentences.cn: 从立法模式上，美国由结构主义向行为主义转化，而德国和欧共体奉行的是行为主义。

sentences.en: He stood on basic pragmatism position to expound self concept with behaviorism viewpoints.
sentences.cn: 他站在实用主义的基本立场上,用行为主义的观点来阐述自我概念.

sentences.en: The basic theories of Computerized education have developed from the behaviorism, cognitionism to the present constructionism.
sentences.cn: 计算机教育应用的理论基础从行为主义 、 认知主义发展到了今天的建构主义.

sentences.en: Those who look to behaviorism in teaching will generally frame their activities by behavioral objectives e . g.
sentences.cn: 采用行为主义的教师通常会用行为目标来构建他们的行为.

sentences.en: Three generations of positivism has affected classical behaviorism, structural psychology and neo - behaviorism respectively.
sentences.cn: 三代实证主义分别影响着激进的行为主义 、 构造主义、新行为主义.
